name: Half Life But The
description:
Coming to you live, it's real, they put hlvrai in undertale.

Well, I did.

This is a spiritual and physical successor to one of the first game dev projects I worked on (the first 10 minutes of hlvr in rpgmaker), and as the recent 3rd anniversary of the series came around… I got all nostalgic, so here it is!

Made in about three weeks, it’s a little shaky in parts, so be nice to it and if you find anything real broken, lemme know.

Currently Windows only, but I hear the engineers are looking at getting it working in browser maybe.

I OWN ! NOTHING!!!
